## BitField.resize() method

Resizes bitfield to new size given (rounded up to multiples of 32).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resize(n: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
